samples.instruction: Passport first time apply pannanum - complete process enna?
samples.current_output:
Step 1 - Online Registration:
1. passportindia.gov.in â†’ 'New User Registration'
2. Create account
3. Login

Step 2 - Fill Application:
1. 'Apply for Fresh Passport'
2. Select: Normal/Tatkaal
3. Fill: Personal, Family, Address, Emergency contact
4. Save and continue

Step 3 - Book Appointment:
1. Select PSK (Passport Seva Kendra)
2. Choose date/time
3. Pay: Normal 36 pages â‚¹1,500, 60 pages â‚¹2,000, Tatkaal +â‚¹2,000
4. Print Application Receipt

Step 4 - PSK Visit:
Documents: Printed application, Aadhaar, PAN, Voter ID/DL, Birth Certificate/SSLC, Address proof (EB bill/Bank statement)

At PSK: Token â†’ Document verification â†’ Biometric â†’ Photo â†’ Final verification â†’ Acknowledgment

Step 5 - Police Verification:
- Police visit address (1-2 weeks)
- Keep documents ready
- Neighbors may be asked

Step 6 - Delivery:
- Speed Post
- Track: passportindia.gov.in
- Normal: 15-30 days
- Tatkaal: 1-7 days

Tips: Same name spelling in all docs, Recent address proof, Reach PSK 15 mins early

â‚¹5 lakh free treatment. Coverage: â‚¹5 lakh per family per year. Eligibility: BPL families as per SECC 2011 data. Treatments: 1,500+ procedures covered. Check eligibility: pmjay.gov.in â†’ Am I Eligible, Enter Aadhaar/Ration Card number. Get card: Ayushman Mitra/Government Hospital, Need Aadhaar + Ration Card + Photo, Free. samples.instruction: Ondrukku merpatta PAN irundhaal enna seyvadhu?
samples.current_output: Illegal! â‚¹10,000 penalty possible. To surrender duplicate PAN: 1. onlineservices.nsdl.com â†’ 'Request for New PAN Card or/and Changes' 2. In Item 11, write PAN numbers to surrender 3. Send original PAN Cards 4. Fee: â‚¹107. Keep only one PAN

samples.instruction: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY) endraal enna?
samples.current_output: Support for pregnant women. Amount: â‚¹5,000 (in 3 installments) - â‚¹1,000 pregnancy registration (within 150 days), â‚¹2,000 - 6 month checkup, â‚¹2,000 - birth registration + vaccination. Eligibility: Women having first child. Apply: Nearby Anganwadi/Government Hospital. Need MCP Card, Aadhaar, Bank Account. In TN: Additional Dr. Muthulakshmi Maternity Benefit Scheme (â‚¹18,000)

samples.instruction: TN Slum Clearance Board veedu eppadi peruvadhu?
samples.current_output: Rehabilitation for slum-dwellers. Eligibility: 10+ years in recognized slum, Name in survey. Types: In-situ development (same location), Resettlement (new location). Cost: Free or subsidized (based on income). Facilities: Basic amenities - water, electricity, toilet. Apply: TNSCB office/Local body. Documents: Slum survey ID, Aadhaar, Ration card. Projects: Multi-storey tenements in Chennai, other cities.

samples.instruction: TN Widow Pension evvalavu? Eligibility enna?

Destitute Widow: â‚¹1,500/month. Apply: Panchayat/Taluk office. Documents: Husband death certificate, Age proof, Income certificate, Aadhaar. 60+: Transferred to IGNOAPS.

samples.instruction: Naan thirumaanam seiya porein. Marriage registration, documents maatram, benefits ellam ennenna seiyya vendum?
samples.current_output:
Before marriage:
1. Marriage Assistance Scheme - Apply 40 days before (if eligible) - 8 gram Gold + â‚¹25,000-50,000

After marriage (within 1 month):
2. Marriage Registration - Sub-Registrar Office - â‚¹100-500

Document changes (for bride):
3. Aadhaar - Name & Address change at ASK (â‚¹50)
4. PAN Card - Name change online (â‚¹107)
5. Voter ID - Form 8 at voters.eci.gov.in
6. Passport - Re-issue with new name (â‚¹1,500)
7. Bank Account - Name & Nominee change
8. Ration Card - Add to husband's or new card
9. Insurance/EPF - Nominee update

samples.instruction: PM-KUSUM scheme endraal enna? Solar pump eppadi vaanguvadhu?
samples.current_output: Solar Energy scheme for farmers. Component A: Install solar power plants (500kW-2MW), sell electricity to grid. Component B: Standalone solar pumps (up to 7.5 HP), 60% subsidy (Central 30% + State 30%), farmer pays only 40%. Component C: Convert existing pump to solar. Apply: mnre.gov.in or State DISCOM. Benefit: Free electricity, reduced carbon footprint.
